tooltip.label: Creates a Holy Lightwell.  Members of your raid or party can click the Lightwell to restore 801 health over 6 sec.  Any damage taken will cancel the effect.  Lightwell lasts for 3 min or 5 charges.

After taking a critical hit you gain the Focused Will effect, reducing all damage taken by 3% and increasing healing effects on you by 7%.  Stacks up to 3 times.  Lasts 8 sec.
After taking a critical hit you gain the Focused Will effect, reducing all damage taken by 4% and increasing healing effects on you by 10%.  Stacks up to 3 times.  Lasts 8 sec.
